title: Virtual Assistant and Creative
job_overview: Hello, I'm looking for a capable, adaptable, creative virtual assistant to assist with a number of tasks involving small project management, email management, social media assistance, website updates, organisation and video editing. It's a broad role working with my Food Styling and Marketing business. I'm looking for someone experienced and available around  10-15 hours a week. There is room to grow into a full time role shopuld the partnership work for both of us. Only apply if you already have this skill set please. Thanks you Kate
